Detailed Description

This singleton class keeps track of and loads Vertices.

VerticesPtr Moo::VerticesManager::get ( const std::string &  resourceID,
int  numNodes = 0 
)

Get the given vertices resource.

If parameter 'numNodes' greater than zero, vertex node indices are verified to be less than 'numNodes', vertex indices that fail verification will be set to zero, and an error message will be displayed. If parameter 'numNodes' is zero, no verification is done. This only applies to skinned vertices.
